publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2621# Cathy Peattie: Fair Trade Fortnightâ€”That the Parliament notes that 4-17 March 2002 is Fair Trade Fortnight and considers that the Scottish Executive should endorse the use of Fair Trade produce, in particular by encouraging schools to incorporate Fair Trade as an element within their curricula and should promote it through other activity. Supported by: Robin Harper*

S1M-2621# Cathy Peattie: Fair Trade Fortnight-That the Parliament notes that 4 - 17 March 2002 is Fair Trade Fortnight and considers that the Scottish Executive should endorse the use of Fair Trade produce, in particular by encouraging schools to incorporate Fair Trade as an element within their curricula and should promote it through other activity. Supported by: Robin Harper
S1M-2621# Fair Trade Fortnight (lodged on 17 January 2002) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Fiona Hyslop*, Bristow Muldoon*
